In fact, in the cxml config file, there is a metadata bean where we can ove=
rride fields like the "jobName" field (by default at "site-1"). How can i a=
utomatically override this field with the current job name ? 

Romain

Le 9=
 juil. 2013 =E0 14:48, Romain Noel a =E9crit :

> I realize that my warcs a=
re annotated with the value "site-1" for the field "isPartOf" (addIfNotBlan=
k(record,"isPartOf", provider.getJobName());) whereas my job name is "websi=
te". I don't understand why...
> 
> Romain
> 
> Le 9 juil. 2013 =E0 14:07, =
Romain Noel a =E9crit :
> 
>> I want to know the job name from where a curi=
 came. I need this information in the precedencePolicy module and also in t=
he textSeed module.
>> 
>> In the warcwriterprocessor, for example, there i=
s this code  
>> able to return the current job name ( provider.getJobName(=
) ) but how is it initialized and can i use it in the precedencePolicy modu=
le and in the textSeed module ?
>> 
>> Thanks a lot,
>> 
>> Romain
>
